scripts.docker-rm:
npm run docker-stop && CURRENT_DIR_NAME=$(basename "$PWD" | tr -dc '[:alnum:]
' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && docker rm ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_nginx_1 ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_phpmyadmin_1 ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_phpfpm_1 ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_mysql_1
scripts.docker-ports:
CURRENT_DIR_NAME=$(basename "$PWD" | tr -dc '[:alnum:]
' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && echo 'server:' && docker port ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_nginx_1 && printf '
' && echo 'phpmyadmin:' && docker port ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_phpmyadmin_1
